knimeNode.name: Fuzzy Rule Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies unknown data to a Fuzzy Rule Model.

fullDescription.intro: The first input port contains the test data while the second contains the Fuzzy Rule Model that is applied to the data. The output data has one additional column containing the predicted class attribute.
fullDescription.option: The name of the predicted column appended to the end of the test data.

A probability between 0.0 and 1.0. Instances where the activation lies above this threshold are classified as a missing (unknown) class. This is useful in cases where the feature space is not completely covered by rules.

ports.dataIn: Test data must have the same column names and types as the Fuzzy Rule Model.
ports.dataOut: Test data with one additional column appended.
ports.modelIn: Fuzzy Rule Model used to classify test data.
